author: lgray
body:
This PR introduces an ID MVA for tracks associated to MTD hits so that poor-quality associations can be flagged. It also introduces additional criteria for selecting hits in the MTD track extended to require compatibility with the beamspot.

Validation can largely be found in the MTD TDR, can reproduce appropriate plots for this PR.

This is one remaining TODO item, create an external package to hold the BDT weights for the new track-quality MVA.

@bendavid @pmeridian
title: Add in vertex constraints for timing hits and an improved track/MTD-hit selection BDT.
